name: Sliding Puzzle (Isiflix Games)
description:
Sliding Puzzle. Sliding puzzle is an easy and very funny game consisting of moving pieces to the correct position in order to assemble the picture. The pieces can be moved to the square next to them, if it is not occupied by another piece.

BECOME A PATRON:
https://www.patreon.com/isiflix

Minimal system requirements:

?S: Windows 7/8.1/10 
Proc: Intel Core 2Duo @ 2.13GHz
Memory: 4 GB 
Video: Intel HD Graphics, NVIDIA 600 Series, AMD 7000 Series
Disc space: 1000 MB

The game is very dependant on RAM. If you have the minimum 4 GB RAM, please
close all other applications before playing.
